sentences: Issues relating to the adverse effects of climate change and the impacts of response measures were highlighted by a number of countries.
IRAN voiced its concern over the current energy policies of industrialized countries that generate market imperfections.

SAUDI ARABIA expressed concern over the impacts of response measures will have, and supported a compensation fund to assist countries whose economies would be affected by the implementation of response measures.
enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
